nodes.text: The Tabor Plains was a grassland on Protobranch, where the majority of the planet's bacta was produced. The Tabor Hospital was suspended above the Tabor Plains on an antigrav platform, along with bacta production plants. When a solar storm hit Protobranch, disabling all technology on the planet, the Tabor Hospital crashed onto the ground.
The Tabor Plains first appeared in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. The spelling of its name was given in the script of the audiobook.
